channel.title: Question about 508 servers
channel.description: Hello . I am thinking about to move on 508 servers, coding . Wanted to ask which source would be the best to use? I tryed already one source but its crushing when i do special attack with dark bow, or attacing some npc. If somebody can recommend to me good 508 server source please post here.

item.title: Question about 508 servers
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“David321, post:1, topic:432437”]Hello .
I am thinking about to move on 508 servers, coding .
Wanted to ask which source would be the best to use?
I tryed already one source but its crushing when i do special attack with dark bow, or attacing some npc.
If somebody can recommend to me good 508 server source please post here.[/quote]
Palidino has released a good 508 source. Although it’s blank. You could also look at berky-scape or davidscape wich has beautiful content.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about 508 servers
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

If i can recomend something id say go with a 562 they are pretty fun to play around with and most of them
now a days has all the new items etc,

one bad thing about 562’s Most-All of them have bad combat…
